DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study prove safety normal condition useof product Dermacyd PH_DETINBACK Tangerine Mix ( Lactic Acid ) .
DOC.brief_title: Dermacyd PH_DETINBACK Tangerine Mix ( Lactic Acid ) - Safety .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Age 10 20 year old ; Integral skin test region ; Use cosmetic product category ; Willingness follow study procedure present clinic day schedule time ; Exclusion criterion : Lactation gestational risk gestation ; Use Antiinflammatory , immunosuppression antihistaminic drug ; Atopic antecedent allergic cosmetic product ; Active cutaneous disease evaluation area ; Diseases cause immunology decrease , diabetes HIV ; Endocrinal pathology ; Intense solar exposure 15 day evaluation ; Treatment four month selection ; The information intend contain consideration relevant patientÂ¿s potential participation clinical trial .
